main.PluginASPCode: <% function EliteArticle(ByVal action) dim blog_EliteArticle if Not IsArray(Application(CookieName&"_blog_EliteArticle")) or action=2 Then dim Elites,Elite set Elites=conn.Execute("SELECT top 15 C.*,L.cate_ID,L.cate_Secret FROM blog_Content AS C,blog_Category AS L where L.cate_ID=C.log_CateID and L.cate_Secret=false and C.log_IsDraft=false and C.log_level='level5' order by log_PostTime Desc") SQLQueryNums=SQLQueryNums+1 TempVar="" do until Elites.EOF if Elites("cate_Secret") then Elite=Elite&TempVar&Elites("log_ID")&"|,|"&Elites("log_Author")&"|,|"&Elites("log_PostTime")&"|,|"&"[隐藏分类日志]" elseif Elites("log_IsShow") then Elite=Elite&TempVar&Elites("log_ID")&"|,|"&Elites("log_Author")&"|,|"&Elites("log_PostTime")&"|,|"&Elites("log_title") else Elite=Elite&TempVar&Elites("log_ID")&"|,|"&Elites("log_Author")&"|,|"&Elites("log_PostTime")&"|,|"&"[隐藏日志]" end if TempVar="|$|" Elites.movenext loop set Elites=nothing blog_EliteArticle=Split(Elite,"|$|") application.Lock application(CookieName&"_blog_EliteArticle")=blog_EliteArticle application.unlock else blog_EliteArticle=application(CookieName&"_blog_EliteArticle") end if if action<>2 then Dim urlLink dim EliteArticle_Items,EliteArticle_Item For Each EliteArticle_Items IN blog_EliteArticle EliteArticle_Item=Split(EliteArticle_Items,"|,|") if blog_postFile = 2 then urlLink = "article/"&EliteArticle_Item(0)&".htm" else urlLink = "article.asp?id="&EliteArticle_Item(0) end if EliteArticle=EliteArticle&""&CCEncode(CutStr(EliteArticle_Item(3),25))&"" Next end if end function '处理精华日志内容 Dim Elite_code if Session(CookieName&"_LastDo")="DelArticle" or Session(CookieName&"_LastDo")="AddArticle" or Session(CookieName&"_LastDo")="EditArticle" then EliteArticle(2) Elite_code=EliteArticle(0) side_html_default=replace(side_html_default,"<$EliteLog$>",Elite_code) side_html=replace(side_html,"<$EliteLog$>",Elite_code) %>
